page_description: Our commitment to digital accessibility and WCAG compliance
statement_subtitle: Our commitment to making Wellio accessible to everyone
commitment_text: Wellio is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We continually improve the user experience for everyone and apply the relevant accessibility standards to ensure we provide equal access to all users.
standards_subtitle: We aim to conform to WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines
wcag_perceivable_desc: Information and user interface components are presentable to users in ways they can perceive.
wcag_operable_desc: User interface components and navigation are operable by all users.
wcag_understandable_desc: Information and the operation of user interface are understandable.
wcag_robust_desc: Content is robust enough to be interpreted by a wide variety of user agents, including assistive technologies.
features_subtitle: Features we've implemented to improve accessibility
feature_screen_reader: Screen reader compatibility with ARIA labels
feature_resize: Text resizing up to 200% without loss of functionality
feature_motion: Reduced motion option for users sensitive to animations
feature_focus: Visible focus indicators for keyboard users
feature_alt_text: Alternative text for all meaningful images
feature_semantic: Semantic HTML structure for better navigation
assistive_text: Wellio is designed to work with assistive technologies including:
feedback_text: If you encounter accessibility barriers on Wellio, or have suggestions for improving accessibility, please contact us. We take accessibility feedback seriously and will work to address any issues.
improvement_text: We are committed to continually improving the accessibility of Wellio. We regularly review our site and content to identify and address accessibility issues. Our team receives ongoing training on accessibility best practices.
